issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement TPC-H Query 12
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10680](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10680). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement TPC-H Query 12 so that we can test JOIN support more fully. We will need to fake some parts for now because we don't support all the expressions in this query.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10680?focusedCommentId=17236992) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8734
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8734>
